mapper.select: /* QUERY ID : serviceListForNotAuthReq */ SELECT svc_id svcId, svc_name svcName, svc_desc svcDesc, svc_prefix svcPrefix, is_dummy isDummy, is_menu isMenu, upper_svc upperSvc, svc_url svcUrl, create_dt createDt, creator creator, auth_required authRequired, use_yn useYn FROM FRWK_CMM_SVCINFO WHERE auth_required = 'N'

/* QUERY ID : getServiceByRoleId : 지정된 롤에 해당하는 서비스 목록을 조회한다. */ SELECT svc_id svcId, svc_name svcName, svc_desc svcDesc, svc_prefix svcPrefix, is_dummy isDummy, is_menu isMenu, upper_svc upperSvc, svc_url svcUrl, create_dt createDt, creator creator, auth_required authRequired, use_yn useYn FROM FRWK_CMM_SVCINFO WHERE use_yn = 'Y' AND SVC_ID IN (SELECT SVC_ID FROM FRWK_CMM_SVCROLEMAP WHERE ROLE_ID = ${roleId})

/* QUERY ID : serviceListWithMapped */ SELECT svc.svc_id svcid, svc.svc_name svcname, svc.svc_desc svcdesc, svc.svc_prefix svcprefix, svc.is_dummy isDummy, svc.is_menu isMenu, svc.upper_svc upperSvc, svc.svc_url svcurl, svc.create_dt createdt, svc.creator creator, svc.auth_required authrequired, svc.use_yn useyn FROM frwk_cmm_svcrolemap map, frwk_cmm_svcinfo svc WHERE map.role_id = #{roleId} AND map.svc_id = svc.svc_id;

/* QUERY ID : serviceListWithNotMapped */ SELECT svc_id svcId, svc_name svcName, svc_desc svcDesc, svc_prefix svcPrefix, svc_url svcUrl, is_dummy isDummy, is_menu isMenu, upper_svc upperSvc, create_dt createDt, creator creator, auth_required authRequired, use_yn useYn FROM FRWK_CMM_SVCINFO WHERE 1 = 1 AND svc_name like #{svcName} AND use_yn like #{useYn} AND is_menu like #{isMenu} AND svc_prefix like #{svcPrefix} AND auth_required like #{authRequired} AND svc_id NOT IN (SELECT svc_id FROM frwk_cmm_svcrolemap WHERE role_id = #{roleId})
/* QUERY ID : getNewServiceId */ SELECT (coalesce(max(svc_id), 0) + 1) FROM FRWK_CMM_SVCINFO;
mapper.insert: /* QUERY ID : insertServiceInfo */ INSERT INTO FRWK_CMM_SVCINFO(svc_id, svc_name, svc_desc, svc_prefix, svc_url, upper_svc, is_dummy, is_menu, creator, auth_required, use_yn) VALUES (#{svcId}, #{svcName}, #{svcDesc}, #{svcPrefix}, #{svcUrl}, #{upperSvc}, upper(#{isDummy}), upper(#{isMenu}), #{creator}, #{authRequired}, upper(#{useYn}))
mapper.select: /* QUERY ID : getServiceInfo */ SELECT svc_id svcId, svc_name svcName, svc_desc svcDesc, svc_prefix svcPrefix, is_dummy isDummy, is_menu isMenu, upper_svc upperSvc, svc_url svcUrl, use_yn useYn, auth_required authRequired, creator creator, create_dt createDt FROM FRWK_CMM_SVCINFO WHERE svc_id = #{svcId}

/* QUERY ID : getServiceInfoByUrl */ SELECT svc_id svcId, svc_name svcName, svc_desc svcDesc, svc_prefix svcPrefix, is_dummy isDummy, is_menu isMenu, upper_svc upperSvc, svc_url svcUrl, use_yn useYn, auth_required authRequired, creator creator, create_dt createDt FROM FRWK_CMM_SVCINFO WHERE svc_url = '${svcUrl}' AND svc_prefix = '${svcPrefix}'

/* QUERY ID : existServiceInfoByUrl */ SELECT CASE WHEN a.cnt > 0 THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END FROM (SELECT count(*) cnt FROM frwk_cmm_svcinfo WHERE svc_url = '${svcUrl}' AND svc_prefix = '${svcPrefix}' ) a
mapper.update: /* QUERY ID : modifyServiceInfo */ UPDATE FRWK_CMM_SVCINFO SET svc_name = #{svcName}, svc_desc = #{svcDesc}, svc_prefix = #{svcPrefix}, is_dummy = upper(#{isDummy}), is_menu = upper(#{isMenu}), upper_svc = #{upperSvc}, svc_url = #{svcUrl}, creator = #{creator}, auth_required = upper(#{authRequired}), use_yn = upper(#{useYn}) WHERE svc_id = #{svcId}
mapper.delete: /* QUERY ID : deleteServiceInfo */ DELETE FROM FRWK_CMM_SVCINFO WHERE svc_id = #{svcId}
mapper.select: /* QUERY ID : getAllServices : 특정사용자가 가지고있는 모든 서비스를 조회 */ SELECT SVC_ID svcId, SVC_NAME svcName, SVC_DESC svcDesc, SVC_PREFIX svcPrefix, IS_DUMMY isDummy, IS_MENU isMenu, UPPER_SVC upperSvc, SVC_URL svcUrl, USE_YN useYn, AUTH_REQUIRED authRequired, CREATOR creator, CREATE_DT createDt FROM FRWK_CMM_SVCINFO WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND SVC_ID IN (SELECT DISTINCT SVC_ID FROM FRWK_CMM_SVCROLEMAP WHERE ROLE_ID IN (SELECT ROLE_ID FROM FRWK_CMM_ROLEUSERMAP WHERE USER_ID = '${userId}' ))
